column3: Description
Use this card on any player (including yourself).
Deal 1 damage to a player.
Block a player's offensive card. You may also use this for any other player at ANY time.
Discard all of a player's buildings.
Steal a player's building
Draw 2 cards.
Damage another player. This does not use an attack.
Switch hands with a player.
Reveal a player's hand ONLY to you.
Discard 2 cards from a player's hand
Draw 3 cards.
When used, place this card upwards in front of you for everyone to see. These cards will give you a passive buff until removed.
Increase your attack limit by 1.
Pick up +1 card at the end of your turn.
Discard when you are damaged. You do not lose a life.
All players can use spells. Increase your ATTACK damage by 1.
Any player MUST own a Spell Tower.
Destroy all player buildings.
Switch health with another player.
Block ANY card played at ANY time.
You cannot be targeted until your next turn.
This must be the last card in the deck. Reveal all player roles.
